column4: just wondering how often the ubuntu servers rebuild the Packages file (i'm anxious for the new restricted-modules)

well, it took me 45min to throw the new tarball up my DSL, then it'll probably take about 5-10 minutes for the buildds to notice and build it, 2m2s/2m10s/3m for the various buildds to build it and then upload it, and then Packages.gz gets regenerated every half hour
oh wow thanks for the details, and thanks for your work
